name: Hanime Scraper
description: Hanime metadata provider with backend scraper service
overview: Jellyfin Hanime metadata plugin, provides rich metadata and images for adult anime content via backend service.

versions.changelog: Initial release: Hanime metadata scraping support with search by title, numeric ID, or URL, rich metadata extraction including titles and ratings, comprehensive image support, personnel information with voice actors, API token authentication, configurable logging, multi-language content support, compatible with Jellyfin 10.10.7.
